channel.title: Notes on Notes to self
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Notes to self

item.title: Books
item.description: The Courage to Be Disliked Authors: Ichiro Kishimi & Fumitake Koga Reviewed on: 16 January 2024 The Courage to Be Disliked is about unlocking the power within yourself to be the person you truly want to be. It is based on the theories of Alfred Adler’s Individual Psychology and is written as a conversation between a philosopher and a young man. While reading this book, I was constantly reminded of Bhagwad Geeta’s message about removing attachement.
